devdoc.author: Stability Labs Pty. Ltd.
devdoc.details: Contains functionality for managing access to a specific lending         platform. pTokens are the generic name given to platform tokens e.g. cDai         Governance are responsible for setting platform and pToken addresses.

initialize(address,address[],address,add.details: Initialization function for upgradable proxy contract.     This function should be called via Proxy just after contract deployment.

setPTokenAddress(address,address).details: Provide support for bAsset by passing its pToken address. This method can only be called by the system Governor

params._pToken: Address for the corresponding platform token

withdrawRaw(address,address,uint256).details: Withdraw given bAsset from the cache

devdoc.title: AbstractIntegration

userdoc.notice: A generalised platform integration contract from which to inherit
